text.__SUMMARY__: The scaly-feathered weaver (Sporopipes squamifrons), also known as the scaly-feathered finch, is a species of bird in the family Ploceidae.
text.Range: It is found in Angola, Botswana, Namibia, South Africa, Zambia, and Zimbabwe.
text.External links:
Scaly-feathered Finch -  Species text in Weaver Watch.
(Scaly-feathered weaver = ) Scaly-feathered finch  - Species text in The Atlas of Southern African Birds.
